00049 void TemplateDataTest::testproperty_Properies()
00050 {
00051         string id = "file_id";
00052         TemplateData temp;
00053         temp.TemplateFileIdentifier() = id;
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.TemplateFileIdentifier() == id);
00055 
00056         temp.DataTypeIdentifier() = "affymetrix-calvin-template";
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.DataTypeIdentifier() == "affymetrix-calvin-template");
00058         temp.CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.CreationDateTime() == L"now");
00060         temp.CreatedBy() = L"me";
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.CreatedBy() == L"me");
00062 }
00063 
00064 void TemplateDataTest::testmethod_Clear()
00065 {
00066         string id = "file_id";
00067         TemplateData temp;
00068         temp.UserAttributes().resize(4);
00069         temp.DataTypeIdentifier() = "affymetrix-calvin-template";
00070         temp.CreationDateTime() = L"now";
00071         temp.CreatedBy() = L"me";
00072         temp.Clear();
00073 
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.TemplateFileIdentifier() == "");
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.UserAttributes().size() == 0);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.DataTypeIdentifier() == "");
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.CreationDateTime() == L"");
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(temp.CreatedBy() == L"");
00079 }
00080 
00081 void TemplateDataTest::testproperty_UserAttributes()
00082 {
00083         TemplateData temp;
00084         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList &params = temp.UserAttributes();
00085         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType vparam;
00086 
00087         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-1");
00088         vparam.SetValueAscii("user-att-value-1");
00089         vparam.SetDefaultValueAscii("user-att-defaultvalue-1");
00090         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00091         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear() ;
00092         params.push_back(vparam);
00093 
00094         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-2");
00095         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-2");
00096         vparam.SetDefaultValueText(L"user-att-defaultvalue-2");
00097         vparam.RequiredFlag() = true;
00098         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().clear()  ;
00099         params.push_back(vparam);
00100 
00101         vparam.SetName(L"user-att-name-3");
00102         vparam.SetValueText(L"user-att-value-3");
00103         vparam.SetDefaultValueText(L"user-att-defaultvalue-3");
00104         vparam.RequiredFlag() = false;
00105         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"control1");
00106         vparam.ControlledVocabulary().push_back(L"control2");
00107         params.push_back(vparam);
00108 
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( temp.UserAttributes().size() == 3 );
00110 
00111         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredTypeList::iterator it = temp.UserAttributes().begin();
00112 
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-1" );
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueAscii() == "user-att-value-1" );
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueAscii() == "user-att-defaultvalue-1" );
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == false);
00118         ++it;
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-2" );
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-2" );
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueText() == L"user-att-defaultvalue-2" );
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 0 );
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == true);
00124         ++it;
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetName() == L"user-att-name-3" );
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetValueText() == L"user-att-value-3" );
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).GetDefaultValueText() == L"user-att-defaultvalue-3" );
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).ControlledVocabulary().size() == 2 );
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*it).RequiredFlag() == false);
00130 
00131         std::list<std::wstring>::iterator controllIt = (*it).ControlledVocabulary().begin();
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*controllIt) == L"control1" );
00133         ++controllIt;
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( (*controllIt) == L"control2" );
00135         ++it;
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (it == temp.UserAttributes().end() );
00137 }
